text.doc: send an SMS to a number of your choice.

mms.doc: send an MMS (by URL) to a number of your choice along with an optional message.

makecall.doc: Calls the specified number with the specified message.

playaudiocall.doc: Calls the specified number and plays the audio at the specified url.

wakeupcall.doc: Creates a wakeup call alarm to a specified phone number at a specified time.

lostmode.doc: Calls the number repeatedly, every 30 minutes. The supplied message is played upon reception.

lookup.doc: Does a lookup for certain information regarding the given query phone number.
